information.name: template
information.description: A routed UCRM Plugin Template using the Slim Framework and Twig Template system.
information.author: Ryan Spaeth <rspaeth@mvqn.net>

configuration.label: Development?
configuration.description: If enabled, the system will force the plugin's environment to 'dev', regardless of the actual environment config.  NOTE: This should be disabled unless the plugin is not functioning correctly and debug information is needed!

configuration.label: Verbose Logging?
configuration.description: If enabled, will include verbose debug messages in the logs.
